Yinka Ayefele MON bụ onye na-emepụta egwu na Naijiria, onye na-agụ egwu ozioma, CDS, VCDS, onye na-egosi redio na onye guzobere Fresh FM Redio Station, di na Ibadan
A mụrụ Ayefele na Ipoti-Ekiti, obodo dị na Ekiti Steeti na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
Ọ gara Our Saviours Anglican Primary School na Ipoti-Ekiti maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị tupu o mesịa gaa Ondo Steeti College of Arts and Science na Ikare Akoko, Ondo State, Naijiria.

Ayefele rụrụ ọrụ obere oge dị ka onye nta akụkọ na onye mgbasa ozi na Federal Radio Corporation of Naijiria, Ibadan, ebe ọ rụpụtakwara jingles na ọrụ egwu na redio. 
Ọ malitere ọrụ egwu ya n'afọ 1997 mgbe o nwere ihe mberede ụgbọala nke mebiri ọkpụkpụ azụ ya ma mee ka ọ dabere na oche nkwagharị. Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ ọgwụ mgbe ọ nọrọ ebe ahụ ihe dị ka ọnwa itoolu, enyi ya, Kola Olootu letara ya ma dụọ ya ọdụ ka ọ chịkọta ụfọdụ egwu. Aro a mere ka ewepụta abọm izizi ya nke akpọrọ, Bitter Experience na afọ 1998 nke mere ka ọ pụta ìhè. Ntọhapụ nke ahụmahụ Bitter sochiri ntọhapụ nke Sweet Experience Abọm ndị ọzọ onye egwu ozioma wepụtara bụ Something Else, Divine Intervention na Life after death, wepụtara iji kwanyere Gbenga Adeboye, onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio na Naijiria, onye egwu na onye na-eme ihe ọchị. Aha Ahụmahụ Ọjọọ gosipụtara nhụjuanya ya na Ahụmahụ Dị Ọjọọ bụ ụtọ mgbe "Ahụmahụ Ọjọọ".
O nwetala ihe karịrị onyinye 200. N'ime onyinye ndị ọzọ bụ:
Yinka Ayefele nwere ụlọ ọrụ redio a na-akpọ Fresh FM 105.9 FM nke dị na Oyo steeti
E guzobere ụlọ ọrụ redio ahụ na afọ 2015 ma nye ikikere site na NBC na 30 Eprel afọ 2015.

Ayefele's Music House, nke nwere ụlọ ọrụ redio Fresh FM na studio, bụ nke Gọọmentị Oyo Steeti kwaturu na 19 Ọgọstụ 2018, na-ekwu na ebe ihe onwunwe ahụ megidere iwu nke ndị isi atụmatụ obodo. Nke a kpalitere iwe site n'aka ndị Fans na ndị na-akwado ya.
